A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely stunning\, it is the best in the series. Incredible action and gorgeous imagery. The cast is impeccable (bar maybe Benicio Del Toro's DJ\, who doesn't quite work) and the central narrative between Kylo Ren and Rey has some of the absolute best scenes ever from Star Wars. I don't know who these people are that saying it's the worst ever. It's the best.
